attributes.action: Instigate a public enquiry into all charities and publish all the findings to the electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more so called Charities are getting on to the bandwagon and being donated public money without true accountabilty.There are no checks and balances against the Charity Managers nor Charity Commission that can be investigated by joe public.We want all the details not just some!
Charities are mere excuses for tax get-outs and are simply self sustaining businesses.If you want to give to charity do it yourself and dont give it to organisations who are simply in it to keep themselves in a job.
